name: Draw_your_own_road_first30sec
description:
https://github.com/PlayGameAriel/Draw-your-own-road-final

The machine is controlled by arrows forward and backward. The space bar is used to increase the power. To collect sweets you need to draw a line with the mouse. Try to draw lines that a real car could climb. I wanted to leave the physical capabilities of the machine.  The machine can enter the drawn line only after you finish drawing the line. try to draw short lines. The line has a timer after which the line will disappear. After the crash, the car starts the game over.
